title: E8 Futures Check website
description: E8 Futures, based in the United States and established in December 2024, is a futures prop trading firm associated with E8 Markets. It offers a 2-Step program and supports the Match-Trader and cTrader platforms through its integrated E8X dashboard. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Prohibited trading activities in Terms and Conditions apply.
Activation fee and subscription required (Signature accounts).

payout_policy.details: Requires 5 winning days (PnL â‰¥ 0.3%). Payout Caps apply: 1st/2nd (2.5%), 3rd (4.5%), 4th (5.5%). 5th+ cap lifted to $25k or E8 Pro transfer. Buffer equal to EOD Trailing Drawdown (4%) must be kept.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed for both evaluation and funded stages.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed to trade using own EA; prohibited activities T&C applies.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Place a trade at least every 7 days to stay active.
firm_rules.news_trading: Evaluation: Allowed. Funded (Sim): positions must be closed 2 mins before/after T1 news.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Not allowed. Overnight holding not allowed.
forbidden_strategies: Prohibited trading activities in Terms and Conditions apply.
Activation fee and subscription required (Signature accounts).

seo_content:
E8 Futures Technical Infrastructure

E8 Futures, based in the United States and established in December 2024, is a futures prop trading firm associated with E8 Markets. It offers a 2-Step program and supports the Match-Trader and cTrader platforms through its integrated E8X dashboard. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: E8 Futures Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of E8 Futures. We analyze their futures environment and execution rules.
